title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the desired properties of the carbon-capturing textiles, target applications, performance metrics, and any relevant regulations or standards.

title: Research and Evaluate Existing Technologies
description: Conduct a comprehensive literature review and market analysis to identify existing carbon-capturing materials, technologies, and methods that could be applied or adapted for textile applications.

title: Design Carbon Capture Mechanism - Revised
description: Revised task description: Design the mechanism by which the textiles will capture and store CO2 from the air. The design should consider factors such as efficiency, durability, environmental impact, scalability, ease of integration with textile manufacturing processes, potential for recycling or regeneration, and the possibility of incorporating moisture-wicking and odor-neutralizing properties to enhance user comfort. Additionally, investigate the feasibility of using renewable energy sources in the carbon capture process and research potential partnerships with sustainable material suppliers.

title: Develop Textile Manufacturing Process
description: Design and develop the manufacturing process for producing the carbon-capturing textiles, including material selection, fiber production, weaving or knitting techniques, and any necessary post-processing steps.

title: Build Prototype and Conduct Testing
description: Create prototypes of the carbon-capturing textiles and conduct extensive testing to evaluate their performance, durability, and environmental impact, as well as any potential health and safety concerns.

title: Develop Production and Scaling Strategy
description: Plan and design the industrial-scale production process for manufacturing the carbon-capturing textiles, considering factors such as cost, scalability, and environmental impact.

title: Conduct Life Cycle Assessment
description: Perform a comprehensive life cycle assessment to evaluate the environmental impact of the carbon-capturing textiles throughout their entire life cycle, from raw material extraction to disposal or recycling.

title: Develop Marketing and Commercialization Strategy
description: Create a marketing and commercialization strategy for the carbon-capturing textiles, including target markets, pricing, branding, and distribution channels.
